// Misaligned highlight to the right of certain organic objects

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4x3 BoneMatrices[75];
//   float4 CameraPositionVS;
//   float4 FogInScattering[4];
//   float4 FogMaxHeight;
//   float4x4 LocalToWorld;
//   float3 MeshExtension;
//   float3 MeshOrigin;
//   float4 SharedFogParameter0;
//   float4 SharedFogParameter1;
//   float4 SharedFogParameter2;
//   float4 SharedFogParameter3;
//   float3 TemporalAAParameters;
//   float4 UniformVertexVector_0;
//   float4 VSRRealDCoefficients1;
//   float4x4 ViewProjectionMatrix;
//   float4x3 WorldToLocal;
//   float bUseExponentialHeightFog;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                     Reg   Size
//   ------------------------ ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix     c0       4
//   CameraPositionVS         c4       1
//   VSRRealDCoefficients1    c6       1
//   BoneMatrices             c7     225
//   LocalToWorld             c232     4
//   FogInScattering          c236     4
//   WorldToLocal             c240     3
//   UniformVertexVector_0    c243     1
//   TemporalAAParameters     c244     1
//   MeshOrigin               c245     1
//   MeshExtension            c246     1
//   SharedFogParameter0      c247     1
//   SharedFogParameter1      c248     1
//   SharedFogParameter2      c249     1
//   SharedFogParameter3      c250     1
//   bUseExponentialHeightFog c251     1
//   FogMaxHeight             c252     1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c5, 3, 0.00784313772, -1, 1
    def c253, 9.98999977, 0.693147182, 1, 2
    def c254, 0, 0.00999999978, -0.00999999978, 0.00100000005
    def c255, 0.499000013, 0.5, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_tangent v1
    dcl_normal v2
    dcl_blendindices v3
    dcl_blendweight v4
    dcl_color o0.xyz
    dcl_color1 o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_texcoord6 o3
    dcl_texcoord5 o4
    dcl_position o5

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 3
dcl_2d s3

    mov r0.xyz, c246
    mad r0.xyz, v0, r0, c245
    mul r1, c5.x, v3
    mova a0.xy, r1
    mul r2, v4.y, c7[a0.y]
    mul r3, v4.y, c8[a0.y]
    mul r4, v4.y, c9[a0.y]
    mad r2, v4.x, c7[a0.x], r2
    mad r3, v4.x, c8[a0.x], r3
    mad r4, v4.x, c9[a0.x], r4
    mova a0.x, r1.z
    mad r2, v4.z, c7[a0.x], r2
    mad r3, v4.z, c8[a0.x], r3
    mad r4, v4.z, c9[a0.x], r4
    mova a0.x, r1.w
    mad r1, v4.w, c7[a0.x], r2
    mad r2, v4.w, c8[a0.x], r3
    mad r3, v4.w, c9[a0.x], r4
    mad r4, v2, c5.y, c5.z
    mad r5.xyz, v1, c5.y, c5.z
    dp3 r6.x, r5, r1
    dp3 r6.y, r5, r2
    dp3 r6.z, r5, r3
    dp3 r5.x, r4, r1
    dp3 r5.y, r4, r2
    dp3 r5.z, r4, r3
    mul r4.xyz, r6.yzxw, r5.zxyw
    mad r4.xyz, r5.yzxw, r6.zxyw, -r4
    mul r4.xyz, r4.w, r4
    mov r0.w, c5.w
    dp4 r1.x, r0, r1
    dp4 r1.y, r0, r2
    dp4 r0.x, r0, r3
    mul r2, r1.y, c233
    mad r1, c232, r1.x, r2
    mad r0, c234, r0.x, r1
    add r0, r0, c235
    mul r1.xyz, r6.y, c233
    mad r1.xyz, c232, r6.x, r1
    mad r1.xyz, c234, r6.z, r1
    mul r2.xyz, r4.y, c233
    mad r2.xyz, c232, r4.x, r2
    mad r2.xyz, c234, r4.z, r2
    mul r3.xyz, r5.y, c233
    mad r3.xyz, c232, r5.x, r3
    mad r3.xyz, c234, r5.z, r3
    mul r7.xyz, r2, c243.y
    mad r7.xyz, r1, c243.x, r7
    mad r7.xyz, r3, c243.z, r7
    add r0.xyz, r0, r7
    mul r7, r0.y, c1
    mad r7, c0, r0.x, r7
    mad r7, c2, r0.z, r7
    mad r7, c3, r0.w, r7
    add r0.w, r7.z, c253.x
    add r1.y, r0.w, c6.x
    log r1.y, r1.y
    mul r1.y, r1.y, c6.y
    mov r8.z, c6.z
    mad r1.w, r1.y, c253.y, r8.z
    mul r1.w, r1.w, c6.x
    mad r1.y, r1.y, -c253.y, c253.z
    add r1.y, r1.y, -c6.z
    rcp r1.y, r1.y
    mul r1.y, r1.y, r1.w
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r1.y
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    add r0.w, r0.w, c5.z
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c6.w
    mad r7.x, r0.w, c253.w, r7.x
    mul r0.w, r7.w, c244.z
    mad r10.xy, r0.w, c244, r7
    mul o1.w, r4.w, c240.w
    mad r8.xyz, r0, -c4.w, c4
    mul r9.xyz, r8.y, c241
    mad r8.xyw, c240.xyzz, r8.x, r9.xyzz
    mad r8.xyz, c242, r8.z, r8.xyww
    dp3 o3.x, r6, r8
    dp3 o3.y, r4, r8
    dp3 o3.z, r5, r8
    abs r0.w, c251.x
    if_lt -r0.w, r0.w
      add r4.xyz, r0, -c4
      dp3 r0.w, r4, r4
      rsq r0.w, r0.w
      rcp r1.y, r0.w
      add r1.y, r1.y, -c247.w
      max r1.y, r1.y, c254.x
      slt r1.w, c254.y, r4_abs.z
      add r2.y, r4.z, c254.z
      mad r1.w, r1.w, r2.y, c254.y
      mul r2.y, r1.w, -c247.y
      exp r2.y, r2.y
      add r2.y, -r2.y, c5.w
      mul r1.yw, r1, c247.xxzy
      rcp r1.w, r1.w
      mul r1.w, r1.w, r2.y
      mul r1.y, r1.w, r1.y
      mul r4.xyz, r0.w, r4
      dp3 r0.w, c250, r4
      mad r0.w, r0.w, -c255.x, c255.y
      pow r1.w, r0.w, c247.z
      mov r4.xyz, c249
      add r4.xyz, -r4, c248
      mad r4.xyz, r1.w, r4, c249
      exp r0.w, -r1.y
      min r0.w, r0.w, c5.w
      max r0.w, r0.w, c248.w
      add r1.y, -r0.w, c5.w
      mul o2.xyz, r1.y, r4
      mov o2.w, r0.w
    else
      add r0.xyz, r0, -c4
      dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
      rsq r0.x, r0.x
      rcp r0.x, r0.x
      mov r4.z, c4.z
      add r5, -r4.z, c250
      sge r0.y, c254.w, r0_abs.z
      lrp r1.y, r0.y, c254.w, r0.z
      rcp r0.y, r1.y
      mul_sat r5, r0.y, r5
      add r4, -r4.z, c252
      mul_sat r4, r0.y, r4
      add r0, r0.x, -c249
      max r0, r0, c254.x
      add r4, -r5, r4
      mul r0, r0, r4_abs
      slt r4, r0, c248
      mul r0, r0, c247
      exp r5.x, r0.x
      exp r5.y, r0.y
      exp r5.z, r0.z
      exp r5.w, r0.w
      mul r0, r4, r5
      mad r4, r4, r5, c5.z
      mul r5.xyz, r4.x, c236
      mov r5.w, r0.x
      mul r5, r0.y, r5
      mad r5.xyz, r4.y, c237, r5
      mul r5, r0.z, r5
      mad r5.xyz, r4.z, c238, r5
      mul r0, r0.w, r5
      mad o2.xyz, r4.w, c239, r0
      mov o2.w, r0.w
    endif
    mov o0.x, r1.x
    mov o0.y, r2.x
    mov o0.z, r3.x
    mov o1.x, r1.z
    mov o1.y, r2.z
    mov o1.z, r3.z
    mov o3.w, c5.w
    mov o4, r7
    mov r10.zw, r7

// approximately 160 instruction slots used

// Output adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 --adjust=position Dumps/SingleShaders/VertexShader/VertexShader_59_CRC32_FC47DD36.txt
texldl r31, c220.z, s3
add r31.w, r10.w, -r31.y
mul r31.w, r31.w, r31.x
add r10.x, r10.x, r31.w

// Molotov Cocktails are misaligned even in 2D. Move bottles to the left to
// realign them. This is only accurate with separation set to 100%.
abs r31.z, r31.x
mul r31.z, r31.z, r10.w
mul r31.z, r31.z, c220.w
add r10.x, r10.x, -r31.z

mov o5, r10
